text: mariyu varilo kondaru pravaktanu tama matalato badha kaligince varunnaru. Varantaru: "Itanu (ceppudu matalu vinevadu." Ila anu: "Atanu vinedi mi meluke! Atanu allah nu visvasistadu mariyu visvasulanu nam'mutadu mariyu milo visvasincina variki atanu karunyamurti." Mariyu allah sandesaharuniki badha kaligince variki badhakaramaina siksa untundi)
